0.text: Innate: Taliyah gains  10 / 15 / 25 / 40% (based on level) bonus movement speed while near terrain, which builds up over 1 second while in range for at least 0.4 seconds, and decays by the same amount once out of range for at least 3 seconds.
0.html: Innate: Taliyah gains  10 / 15 / 25 / 40% (based on level) bonus movement speed while near terrain, which builds up over 1 second while in range for at least 0.4 seconds, and decays by the same amount once out of range for at least 3 seconds.

0.text: 10 / 15 / 25 / 40% (based on level)

markedPassages: 10 / 15 / 25 / 40% (based on level)
10 / 15 / 25 / 40% (based on level)

1.text: Entering combat or casting an ability puts Rock Surfing on a  2-second cooldown, which refreshes continuously while remaining in these states.
1.html: Entering combat or casting an ability puts Rock Surfing on a  2-second cooldown, which refreshes continuously while remaining in these states.
markedPassages: 2-second

0.text: RANGE:  1000

Active: Taliyah throws a volley of 5 Stone Shards in the target direction over 1.5 seconds that each shatter upon the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  revealing them for 0.5 seconds. Subsequent hits deal 40% damage.
0.html: Active: Taliyah throws a volley of 5 Stone Shards in the target direction over 1.5 seconds that each shatter upon the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and revealing them for 0.5 seconds. Subsequent hits deal 40% damage.
markedPassages: revealing

1.text: Taliyah can move and cast other abilities while launching Stone Shards, and is unable to basic attack until she launches the third Stone Shard.
1.html: Taliyah can move and cast other abilities while launching Stone Shards, and is unable to basic attack until she launches the third Stone Shard.

2.text: Casting Threaded Volley creates a 400-unit area of Worked Ground at Taliyah's location that lasts 30 seconds. Casting Threaded Volley on Worked Ground will instead consume the area to become empowered with a new effect, cost  20 mana and have  50% reduced cooldown, though not below 0.75 seconds.
2.html: Casting Threaded Volley creates a 400-unit area of Worked Ground at Taliyah's location that lasts 30 seconds. Casting Threaded Volley on Worked Ground will instead consume the area to become empowered with a new effect, cost  20 mana and have  50% reduced cooldown, though not below 0.75 seconds.
markedPassages: 20 mana
50%

3.text: Empowered Active: Taliyah hurls a Boulder that explodes upon the first enemy hit, dealing  190% damage to them and normal damage to nearby enemies,  slowing all targets hit for 1.5 seconds and  revealing them for 0.5 seconds.  Monsters hit are also  stunned for 3 seconds.
3.html: Empowered Active: Taliyah hurls a Boulder that explodes upon the first enemy hit, dealing 190% damage to them and normal damage to nearby enemies, slowing all targets hit for 1.5 seconds and revealing them for 0.5 seconds. Monsters hit are also stunned for 3 seconds.
markedPassages: slowing
revealing
Monsters
stunned

4.text: Against  monsters, Threaded Volley deals 25 (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage per Stone Shard, and the Boulder deals 47.5 (+ 19% AP) bonus magic damage against the primary target. This bonus damage is unaffected by the damage modifier from subsequent hits.
4.html: Against monsters, Threaded Volley deals 25 (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage per Stone Shard, and the Boulder deals 47.5 (+ 19% AP) bonus magic damage against the primary target. This bonus damage is unaffected by the damage modifier from subsequent hits.
markedPassages: monsters

0.text: TARGET RANGE: 900
Active: Taliyah marks the target location and selects a direction. After 0.759 seconds, a ledge erupts from the area that  knocks enemies hit 400 units in the target direction over 1 second.
0.html: Active: Taliyah marks the target location and selects a direction. After 0.759 seconds, a ledge erupts from the area that knocks enemies hit 400 units in the target direction over 1 second.
markedPassages: knocks

0.text: EFFECT RADIUS: 800

Active: Taliyah scatters a field of 22 stones across the ground in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit. The stones remain for 4 seconds and  slow enemies within the area by 20%.
0.html: Active: Taliyah scatters a field of 22 stones across the ground in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit. The stones remain for 4 seconds and slow enemies within the area by 20%.
markedPassages: slow

1.text: Enemies that  dash or are  knocked into a stone will detonate it, dealing magic damage and  stunning them for 2 seconds, which is then set to 0.75 seconds for non- monsters after the movement ends.
1.html: Enemies that dash or are knocked into a stone will detonate it, dealing magic damage and stunning them for 2 seconds, which is then set to 0.75 seconds for non- monsters after the movement ends.
markedPassages: dash
knocked
stunning
monsters

2.text: An enemy can detonate up to 4 stones, but the damage is reduced by 0% − 75% (based on stones detonated). Unraveled Earth can affect targets only once per cast; the stones will still detonate but not apply their effects.
2.html: An enemy can detonate up to 4 stones, but the damage is reduced by 0% − 75% (based on stones detonated). Unraveled Earth can affect targets only once per cast; the stones will still detonate but not apply their effects.

0.text: 0% − 75% (based on stones detonated)

3.text: Unraveled Earth deals 150% damage against  monsters.
3.html: Unraveled Earth deals 150% damage against monsters.
markedPassages: monsters

0.text: TARGET RANGE: 2500 / 4500 / 6500

Active: Taliyah summons a torrent of spiraling rocks that cascades in the target direction,  knocking aside champions hit and erecting a wall of terrain in its wake. The wall lasts for 5 seconds after completion, then slowly disintegrates from the starting end.
0.html: Active: Taliyah summons a torrent of spiraling rocks that cascades in the target direction, knocking aside champions hit and erecting a wall of terrain in its wake. The wall lasts for 5 seconds after completion, then slowly disintegrates from the starting end.
markedPassages: knocking aside

1.text: Taliyah also  channels for 1 second, during which Weaver's Wall can be recast and she  reveals herself. While the wall remains fully formed, she gains another recast empowered with a new effect.
1.html: Taliyah also channels for 1 second, during which Weaver's Wall can be recast and she reveals herself. While the wall remains fully formed, she gains another recast empowered with a new effect.
markedPassages: channels
reveals

2.text: Recast: Upon completing the  channel, Taliyah  surfs on the wall as it emerges,  revealing herself in the process. After 0.75 seconds, she may input a movement command to  jump off the wall to the target location, and automatically does so upon being  immobilized,  polymorphed, or reaching the finishing end.
2.html: Recast: Upon completing the channel, Taliyah surfs on the wall as it emerges, revealing herself in the process. After 0.75 seconds, she may input a movement command to jump off the wall to the target location, and automatically does so upon being immobilized, polymorphed, or reaching the finishing end.
markedPassages: channel
surfs
revealing
jump
immobilized
polymorphed

3.text: Empowered Recast: Taliyah instantly destroys the wall.
3.html: Empowered Recast: Taliyah instantly destroys the wall.

4.text: Weaver's Wall is placed on a  3-second cooldown upon dealing  basic or ability damage, or upon taking  champion or  turret damage.
4.html: Weaver's Wall is placed on a  3-second cooldown upon dealing basic or ability damage, or upon taking champion or turret damage.
markedPassages: 3-second
basic
champion
turret
